import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useLanguage } from '../context/LanguageContext'; const GenerateReport = () => { const { t } = useLanguage(); const [showCustomDate, setShowCustomDate] = useState(false); const handleDateRangeChange = (e) => { setShowCustomDate(e.target.value === 'custom'); }; return (

{t('generateReportTitle')}

{t('generateReportSubtitle')}

{showCustomDate && (
)}
{t('reportGeneratedNotice')}
); }; export default GenerateReport;
